metadata.title: CVE-2024-3861 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: If an AlignedBuffer were assigned to itself, the subsequent self-move couldresult in an incorrect reference count and later use-after-free. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 125 and Firefox ESR < 115.10.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs102 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
